tools, involved features and correct par: Involved Features: All features in both train (train.csv) and test (test.csv) datasets
expected output or impact on data: Summary information including data types and non-null counts
Basic statistics (mean, std, min, max, etc.) for numerical features
constraints: Ensure the datasets are correctly loaded and handle any encoding issues.

tools, involved features and correct par: Involved Features: All features, focusing on Age and Cabin
expected output or impact on data: List of features with their respective counts of missing values
Heatmap visualization (if applicable) to illustrate the distribution of missing values
constraints: Ensure the heatmap is efficient and clear; limit details to avoid clutter.

tools, involved features and correct par: Involved Features: Categorical: Sex, Pclass, Embarked; Numerical: Age, Fare
expected output or impact on data: Visualizations showing the distributions of key categorical and numerical features
Summary statistics revealing survival rates segmented by gender, class, and embarkation port
constraints: Limit visualizations to those that provide the most insight; avoid unnecessary complexity.

tools, involved features and correct par: Involved Features: Numerical features (Age, SibSp, Parch, Fare) and the target variable (Survived)
expected output or impact on data: Correlation matrix highlighting the relationships between features and survival
Heatmap visualization to illustrate the correlations clearly
constraints: Ensure clarity in visual representation; focus on significant correlations.
